column1: *I've watched this video so many times. Not only is the song amazing, but I love how much fun Liam, Zedd, and the crowd are* *having in the video. I wish I was there and I hope one day I'm lucky enough to collab with Zedd. The man is a music genius.* *Hope you like my music.*
